mapper.select: SELECT dept_cd , parent_dept_cd , dept_name , manager_emp_id , create_at , company_no FROM department WHERE company_no = #{companyNo}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO department t USING ( SELECT #{deptCd} AS dept_cd, #{companyNo} AS company_no FROM dual ) s ON ( t.dept_cd = s.dept_cd AND t.company_no = s.company_no ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.parent_dept_cd = #{parentDeptCd}, t.dept_name = #{deptName}, t.manager_emp_id = #{managerEmpId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( dept_cd, parent_dept_cd, dept_name, manager_emp_id, create_at, company_no ) VALUES ( #{deptCd}, #{parentDeptCd}, #{deptName}, #{managerEmpId}, SYSDATE, #{companyNo} )
